benchmark_details.name: CodeMirage
benchmark_details.overview: CodeMirage is the first benchmark dataset for code hallucinations containing 1,137 generated Python code snippets from GPT-3.5, focusing on various types of code hallucinations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To investigate and provide a benchmark for detecting hallucinations in code generated by large language models.
tasks: Evaluate language model performance in code generation

data.annotation: Human-validated across 5 categories of code hallucinations

methodology.calculation: Evaluated using macro metrics for model performance
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in detecting hallucinations
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4 achieved the best F1 score on HumanEval.
methodology.validation: Human evaluation of code snippets for hallucination types
